name: Shield Bash
description: Strikes with a shield attack that hits for 50-67 + 58% Crushing Weapon Damage, leaving your target Dazed and removing two Dodge pips. Shield Bash has a 100% Critical Hit Chance for 94-128 if used again within five seconds. This attack is enabled after performing three consecutive basic attacks or when you fill your Block Meter. This attack can be instantly Flash-Cast.
